column4: Hi i'm trying to get a partition to automount when i boot computer but it doesn't seem to be working, this is what i've added to fstab. /dev/sda2     /media/sda2     vfat         rw,users,auto,exec       0  0
anyone know what i'm doing wrong/
I wanted to know that too, plz someone help us..
And what do I do for NTFS ?
